name: flock
content:
flock noun
(GROUP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] a group of sheep, goats, or birds: flock of a flock of sheep/goats/geese The shepherd is bringing his flock down from the hills.
MarcusRudolph.nl/Moment/GettyImages
[ C, + sing/pl verb ] a large group of people, usually people of a particular type: flock of A noisy flock of tourists came into the building. The priest invited all the members of his flock (= all the people who go to his church) to attend the special service.
